WebGLRenderingContextDrawingBufferColorS.summary: The WebGLRenderingContext.drawingBufferColorSpace property specifies the color space of the WebGL drawing buffer. Along with the default (srgb), the display-p3 color space can be used.

remarks.para: See WebGLRenderingContext.unpackColorSpace for specifying the color space for textures.

WebGLRenderingContextDrawingBufferColorS.value: This property can have the following values:If an invalid value is specified, then the value of drawingBufferColorSpace will remain unchanged.
